subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: At 28, Brandon Weeden has been a source of stability for No. 3-ranked Oklahoma State, whose game Saturday against No. 13 Oklahoma is for stakes beyond bragging rights.
snippet: At 28, Brandon Weeden has been a source of stability for No. 3-ranked Oklahoma State, whose game Saturday against No. 13 Oklahoma is for stakes beyond bragging rights.
